page.title: 06HOUSING IN CRAWCROOK
page.content: The most modern estate in the area began over 5 years ago. It is situated on the south of Main Street in Crawcrook. Built on farmland, it continues to grow year by year and will eventually contain well over 500 houses and a Primary School. A variety of dwellings can be found: link villas, bungalows, semi-detached and detached houses as well as timber-framed buildings and housing four flats each. The latest development conatins individually designed detached houses on their own sites. This is in contrast to the majority of the estate which consists of fairly small rooms built together. Most houses sre built with red brick and roofing tiles. Window frames are mainly wooden and almost all gutters and pipes are plastic.
